#summary CG Ant Tasks documentation
=Ant Tasks=

==Overview==

 * The GUI tasks:
   * [MultipleInputTask multiple input]: allow to set several properties to input values in the same window
   * [FileEditorTask file editor]: very simple file editor
   * [FileChooserTask file chooser]: a basic swing file chooser
   * [ListChooserTask list chooser]: as input but using a comboBox

 * The regexp tasks:
   * [GrepTask grep]: search in a file
   * [ReplaceTask replace]: replace a substring in a property

==Install==

 # Download the CGAntTasks.jar [http://cgtools.googlecode.com/files/CGAntTasks.jar here]
 # Add it to your ANT additional classpath
 # Add the XML namespace in your ANT project
   {{{
   <project name="MY_PROJECT" 
            xmlns:cgtools="antlib:org.cgtools.anttasks.ant">
   }}}
 # Call the tasks as follow:
   {{{
   <cgtools:minput message="Enter the following values:" length="25">
      <inputline label="Label A: " text="my_value_for_a" property="result.for.a"/>
      <inputline label="Label B: " property="result.for.b"/>
    </cgtools:minput>
    <echo>${result.for.a} and ${result.for.b}</echo>
   }}}

==Usage==

 * [MultipleInputTask muinput]
 * [FileEditorTask editor]
 * [FileChooserTask fileChooser]
 * [ListChooserTask listChooser]
 * [GrepTask grep]
 * [ReplaceTask replace]
